Key Match Events: Jhon Córdoba scored the opening goal in the eighth minute.
James Rodríguez scored a powerful penalty kick in the 18th minute.
Luis Díaz scored a lobbed goal in the 41st minute.
Richard Ríos scored a long right-footed shot in the 70th minute.
Miguel Borja converted a penalty kick in stoppage time.
Post-Match Reflections: Colombia coach Néstor Lorenzo praised Rodríguez's performance.
Panama manager Thomas Christiansen acknowledged Colombia's quality, speed, and intensity.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia came into the match on a 26-match unbeaten streak.
The game was played in front of an announced crowd of 39,740 at State Farm Stadium.
The stadium’s retractable roof was closed due to temperatures around 115°F (46°C).
